name: APlayerState
doc:
A PlayerState is created for every player on a server (or in a standalone game).
PlayerStates are replicated to all clients, and contain network game relevant information about the player, such as playername, score, etc.

OnPawnSet: Broadcast whenever this player's possessed pawn is set
PawnPrivate: The pawn that is controlled by by this player state.
bIsSpectator: Gets the literal value of bIsSpectator.
bIsABot: Gets the literal value of bIsABot.
bShouldUpdateReplicatedPing:
Whether or not this player's replicated CompressedPing value is updated automatically.
Since player states are always relevant by default, in cases where there are many players replicating,
replicating the ping value can cause additional unnecessary overhead on servers if the value isn't
needed on clients.

methods.name: GetUniqueId
methods.doc: Gets the online unique id for a player. If a player is logged in this will be consistent across all clients and servers.

methods.name: GetCompressedPing
methods.doc: Gets the literal value of the compressed Ping value (Ping = PingInMS / 4).

methods.name: GetPawn
methods.doc: Return the pawn controlled by this Player State.

methods.name: GetPingInMilliseconds
methods.doc:
Returns the ping (in milliseconds)

Returns ExactPing if available (local players or when running on the server), and
the replicated CompressedPing (converted back to milliseconds) otherwise.

Note that replication of CompressedPing is controlled by bShouldUpdateReplicatedPing,
and if disabled then this will return 0 or a stale value on clients for player states
that aren't related to local players

methods.name: GetPlayerController
methods.doc: Return the player controller that created this player state, or null for remote clients

methods.name: GetPlayerId
methods.doc: Gets the literal value of PlayerId.

methods.name: GetScore
methods.doc: Gets the literal value of Score.

methods.name: IsABot
methods.doc: Gets the literal value of bIsABot.

methods.name: IsOnlyASpectator
methods.doc: Gets the literal value of bOnlySpectator.

methods.name: IsSpectator
methods.doc: Gets the literal value of bIsSpectator.

methods.name: CopyProperties
methods.doc:
* Can be implemented in Blueprint Child to move more properties from old to new PlayerState when traveling to a new level
*
* @param NewPlayerState         New PlayerState, which we fill with the current properties

methods.name: OverrideWith
methods.doc:
* Can be implemented in Blueprint Child to move more properties from old to new PlayerState when reconnecting
*
* @param OldPlayerState         Old PlayerState, which we use to fill the new one with
